name: @authing/jose
description: Webpack v4 compatible version of panva/jose v3.x

scripts.build-fast:browser: npm run-script runtime-browser && npm run-script -s esbuild-find | xargs -0 esbuild --log-level=warning --target=es2018 --outdir=dist/browser --format=esm && echo '{"type": "module"}'> dist/browser/package.json
scripts.build-fast:node-cjs: npm run-script runtime-node && npm run-script -s esbuild-find | xargs -0 esbuild --log-level=warning --platform=node --target=node12 --outdir=dist/node/cjs --format=cjs
scripts.build-fast:node-esm: npm run-script runtime-node && npm run-script -s esbuild-find | xargs -0 esbuild --log-level=warning --platform=node --target=node12 --outdir=dist/node/esm --format=esm && echo '{"type": "module"}'> dist/node/esm/package.json
scripts.build-fast:node-webcrypto-cjs: npm run-script runtime-node-webcrypto && npm run-script -s esbuild-find | xargs -0 esbuild --log-level=warning --platform=node --target=esnext --outdir=dist/node/webcrypto/cjs --format=cjs
scripts.build-fast:node-webcrypto-esm: npm run-script runtime-node-webcrypto && npm run-script -s esbuild-find | xargs -0 esbuild --log-level=warning --platform=node --target=esnext --outdir=dist/node/webcrypto/esm --format=esm && echo '{"type": "module"}'> dist/node/webcrypto/esm/package.json
scripts.build:types: npm run-script build -- -p ./tsconfig/types.json && cd src && find . -name '*.d.ts' -maxdepth 2 -type f -exec gcp --parents "{}" ../dist/types  \; && cd .. && node ./tools/strip-dts-comments && run-s -s types:find | xargs -0 sed -i '' -e "s/.js//g"
scripts.coverage: npm run-script runtime-node && c8 npm run-script test
scripts.coverage-cryptokey: npm run-script runtime-node && c8 npm run-script test-cryptokey
scripts.coverage-webcrypto: npm run-script runtime-node-webcrypto && c8 npm run-script test-webcrypto
scripts.docs:generate: typedoc --allReflectionsHaveOwnDocument --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --gitRevision main --readme none --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs --excludeExternals --tsconfig ./tsconfig/browser.json  --hideGenerator --hideBreadcrumbs src/types.d.ts src/jwt/*.ts src/jwe/**/*.ts src/jws/**/*.ts src/jwk/*.ts src/jwks/*.ts src/util/*.ts
scripts.runtime-node-webcrypto: run-s runtime:clear runtime:browser:* && cp ./src/runtime/node/webcrypto.ts ./src/runtime/ && cp ./src/runtime/node/fetch_jwks.ts ./src/runtime/ && cp ./src/runtime/node/base64url.ts ./src/runtime/ && cp ./src/runtime/node/zlib.ts ./src/runtime/ && run-s runtime:refs
scripts.test-browser: find test-browser -type f -name '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 npx esbuild --log-level=warning --outdir=dist-browser-tests --bundle && karma start
scripts.test-cjs: rm -rf test/cjs && find test -type f -name '*.mjs' -print0 | xargs -0 npx esbuild --log-level=warning --target=esnext --outdir=test/cjs --format=cjs
